title.zh-CN: 周末值得打开的 8 个网站

description.en: From internet history to ambient noise to AI builders — 8 sites that actually pulled me in this week. Most need no signup.
description.zh-CN: 互联网博物馆、白噪音生成器、AI 建站工具——8 个我这周打开后真的多看了几眼的网站。

description.en: Scroll through 57 internet milestones, from the first email to early YouTube. It's interactive history that doesn't feel like homework.
description.zh-CN: 互联网历史互动时间线，从第一封邮件到早期 YouTube 一共 57 个节点。不是枯燥的编年史，每个点进去都有意思。

description.en: Mix 84 ambient sounds however you want. Rain + distant train + soft static. I use it when I need to focus or just sit still for a minute.
description.zh-CN: 84 种环境音随便叠加。窗外雨声 + 远处火车 + 轻微白噪音。我用它来专注，或者单纯发个呆。

description.en: Sorts 130k+ subreddits by pain points, feature requests, and money talk. If you're building something, this is where you find what people actually want.
description.zh-CN: 把 Reddit 13 万个子版块按痛点、需求、花钱讨论自动分类。做产品的人进去基本出不来。

description.en: The most visually striking websites on the internet, updated daily. Pure inspiration if you're tired of template designs.
description.zh-CN: 互联网上视觉最炸的网页设计合集，每天更新。看腻了模板网站的话，这里全是灵感。

description.en: Unlike Godly's "wow" factor, this one collects sites that just feel good to use. Subtle animations, clean layouts, warmth over flashiness.
description.zh-CN: 跟 Godly 的「炸眼」不同，这里收集的是「用起来舒服」的网站。细节动画、克制排版、温度感大于炫技。

description.en: Describe an app in plain English, get a working full-stack project in minutes. Best way to start something on a Saturday morning.
description.zh-CN: 用自然语言描述一个应用，几分钟给你一个能跑的全栈项目。周六早上想做点什么的时候，从这开始最快。

description.en: Build, run, and deploy a web app entirely in your browser. No terminal, no local setup. Just type what you want and watch it build.
description.zh-CN: 在浏览器里直接构建、运行、部署 Web 应用。不用终端，不用本地环境，说清楚你要什么，看着它给你搭出来。

description.en: Goals, habits, and tasks in one clean space. A good weekend is also when you figure out what actually matters in your week.
description.zh-CN: 目标、习惯、任务放在一个干净的界面里。好的周末，也是想清楚「这周什么最重要」的时候。

title.zh-CN: AI 创作工坊：一个人的全制作流

description.en: From code to music, 3D to slides — ten tools that handle the production work so you don't need a team.
description.zh-CN: 从代码到音乐，从 3D 到演示文稿，这十个工具让你一个人就能撑起整条创作流水线。

description.en: Describe the UI you want, get a working React component. No design handoff, no back-and-forth.
description.zh-CN: 描述你想要的界面，直接拿到可用的 React 组件。v0 把 UI 设计从多步流程变成一次对话。

description.en: Turn rough notes into presentation-ready slides. Minutes, not hours.
description.zh-CN: 把粗糙的想法丢进去，拿回精美的幻灯片。Gamma 让演示准备从几小时缩短到几分钟。

description.en: Cinematic video effects without a film crew. Text prompts become polished motion graphics.
description.zh-CN: 不需要摄制组，用文字描述就能出电影级动效视频。

description.en: Describe an object, get a textured 3D model in seconds. No modeling skills needed.
description.zh-CN: 输入一段描述，几秒后就能得到带纹理的 3D 模型。不需要建模技能。

description.en: Background music on demand. Pick a mood, get a royalty-free track that's brand new.
description.zh-CN: 视频需要配乐？描述你要的氛围，就能拿到一段五秒前还不存在的免版税音乐。

description.en: Isolate vocals, strip noise, separate instruments. Audio cleanup in one tool.
description.zh-CN: 分离人声、去除背景噪音、提取乐器音轨。音频后期必备的清理工具。

description.en: Talk instead of type. Voice becomes clean, structured writing in any app.
description.zh-CN: 用说的代替打字。在任何应用里把语音变成结构清晰的文字——不只是转录，是真正的写作。

description.en: SVG generators for gradients, patterns, and textures. Backgrounds for any project, ready in seconds.
description.zh-CN: SVG 渐变、纹理、图案的生成器合集。每个创意项目都需要背景素材——fffuel 几秒搞定。

description.en: Plain screenshots become polished marketing visuals. One click, no Figma needed.
description.zh-CN: 把普通截图变成精美的营销展示图。一键操作，多种模板，不用打开 Figma。

description.en: Your data, your chart. AI picks the right format and makes it look good.
description.zh-CN: 上传数据，描述你想要的图表。设计上的事交给 AI，你只管讲好故事。

title.en: Six Things You Can Do With Sound Now

description.en: From listening to the world to building your own — six tools that cover what's possible with sound today.
description.zh-CN: 从听见世界到造出声音——当下声音创作的六个方向。

description.en: Spin a 3D globe to tune into live radio from anywhere. Tokyo at 3am, a cafe in Paris, a truck stop in Nevada — thousands of stations, zero signup.
description.zh-CN: 转动地球仪，听世界任何角落的电台。凌晨三点的东京、巴黎咖啡馆、内华达州卡车休息站——上千个电台，零门槛。

description.en: Layer 84 ambient sounds however you want. Rain + distant train + city hum. Free, open source, no account needed — just sound.
description.zh-CN: 84 种环境音自由叠加。雨声 + 远处火车 + 城市低鸣。免费、开源、免注册——只有声音本身。

description.en: Talk instead of type. Your voice becomes structured writing in any app — not transcription, actual writing at 4x speed.
description.zh-CN: 用说的代替打字。你的声音直接变成文章——不是逐字转录，是真的在写作，四倍速。

description.en: Need background music? Describe the mood, get a track that didn't exist five seconds ago. AI meets hundreds of musicians' stems — royalty-free.
description.zh-CN: 视频需要配乐？描述氛围，拿到一段五秒前还不存在的音乐。AI 混合数百位音乐人的片段素材，免版权。

description.en: Text becomes voice — natural, expressive, multilingual. Clone your own or use theirs. Audiobooks, videos, apps all sound human now.
description.zh-CN: 文字变成声音——自然、有情感、多语言。克隆你的声音，或直接用现成的。有声书、视频、App 听起来都像真人在说话。

description.en: Pull apart any audio. Isolate vocals, strip noise, separate instruments. What used to need a studio now happens in your browser.
description.zh-CN: 拆解任何音频。分离人声、去除噪音、提取乐器。以前需要录音棚的事，现在浏览器里就能做。

title.en: 8 Sites That Do the Work of Ten Apps

description.en: One site, dozens of tools. These eight do the work of ten apps each — and most of them are free.
description.zh-CN: 每个都是某个领域的百宝箱，打开一个网址就能解决一堆问题。大部分免费。

description.en: Hundreds of micro-tools — text formatting, image editing, CSS generators, QR codes, color pickers — in a single tab. The kind of site that kills ten bookmarks at once.
description.zh-CN: 文本处理、图片编辑、CSS 生成、二维码、颜色选择器……数百个小工具塞在一个网址里。打开一次，书签栏可以删掉十个。

description.en: 60+ SVG generators for gradients, patterns, blobs, textures, and shapes. Every time you need a background or decorative element, this one site has you covered.
description.zh-CN: 60 多个 SVG 生成器，渐变、纹理、波浪、色块、图案全都有。每次做项目需要背景素材，来这一个地方就够了。

description.en: Merge, split, compress, convert, encrypt — all in your browser. No file ever leaves your machine. The PDF toolkit you reach for instead of installing yet another app.
description.zh-CN: 合并、拆分、压缩、转格式、加密——全在浏览器里完成，文件不上传到任何服务器。以后处理 PDF 不用再装桌面软件了。

description.en: On Mac, a single keyboard shortcut opens an entire productivity layer — app launcher, clipboard manager, window control, AI assistant, and 1,300+ community extensions. One tool that absorbs dozens.
description.zh-CN: Mac 上按一个快捷键，打开一整层生产力工具——应用启动、剪贴板管理、窗口控制、AI 助手，外加 1300 多个社区扩展。一个工具吞掉了几十个。

description.en: 400+ integrations, visual workflow builder, and you host it yourself. The open-source glue between every tool you use — your data never leaves your server.
description.zh-CN: 400 多个集成、可视化工作流编辑器，而且你自己托管。开源的万能胶，把你用的工具全串起来，数据留在自己服务器上。

description.en: Where n8n is for developers, Gumloop is for everyone else. Drag, drop, connect 125+ apps, and let AI handle the logic. Your whole team can build automations without writing a line.
description.zh-CN: 如果说 n8n 是给开发者的，Gumloop 就是给所有人的。拖拽连接 125 个以上应用，逻辑交给 AI。整个团队都能搭自动化，不用写一行代码。

description.en: Need to sketch an idea? Open Excalidraw. Flowcharts, wireframes, system diagrams — all come out in that hand-drawn style. No signup, real-time collab, works in your browser.
description.zh-CN: 想画个东西说明一下？打开 Excalidraw 就行。流程图、线框图、系统架构——出来全是手绘风格。不用注册，实时协作，浏览器里直接画。

description.en: An open-source platform for building AI agents, chatbots, and workflows — visually. Plug in any LLM, add your knowledge base, deploy. One platform, many AI products — without starting from scratch each time.
description.zh-CN: 开源的 AI 应用搭建平台，拖拽式编排 Agent、聊天机器人、自动化流程。接入任意大模型，挂上知识库，直接部署。一个平台搭出聊天机器人、知识问答、自动化流程——不用每次从零开始。

description.en: 8 websites that still feel handmade. Pixel-art drum machines, hand-drawn animations, dot-matrix life calendars — rough edges, warm textures, real craft.
description.zh-CN: 当 AI 可以生成一切的时候，这些网站还是手工做的。粗糙的边缘，温暖的质感，打开就知道有人在认真做这件事。

description.en: A pixel-art drum machine in your browser — monochrome interface, VT323 font, lo-fi warmth no AI could fake.
description.zh-CN: 像素风鼓机，打开浏览器就能敲节拍。单色界面加 VT323 字体，那种 lo-fi 的温度是 AI 生成不出来的。

description.en: Turns technical diagrams into wobbly, hand-drawn animations — like someone explaining things on a whiteboard.
description.zh-CN: 把技术图表变成手绘动画。歪歪扭扭的线条让复杂概念变得亲切，像有人在白板上边画边讲。

description.en: Kids draw, parents write, and every month it gets printed into a real book for your shelf.
description.zh-CN: 孩子画画，家长写字，每个月印成一本实体书。在无限刷新的时代，这个社交网络最终会出现在你的书架上。

description.en: An icon library where everything moves — every hover, every click has its own animation. Someone sat there and made each one by hand.
description.zh-CN: 这个图标库里每个图标都会动。悬停、点击、加载，每个动作都有自己的动画。你能感觉到有人一个一个做出来的。

description.en: Focus mode dims everything except the current paragraph — a typewriter for the browser age.
description.zh-CN: 一个只剩下你和文字的写作工具。专注模式下只有当前段落是亮的，像一台只显示当前行的打字机。

description.en: Your life as 4,160 dots, one per week. Dot-matrix wallpaper that makes time feel real every time you unlock.
description.zh-CN: 把你的人生变成 4160 个点，每个点是一周。点阵风格，不花哨但看一眼就忘不掉。每次解锁手机，时间都在回望你。

description.en: Type a mood, get a palette. "Sunday morning" becomes amber and cream — simple idea, surprisingly fun to play with.
description.zh-CN: 输入一种感觉，得到一组颜色。把抽象的文字变成具体的色彩，像一次小小的通感体验。

description.en: Spin a 3D globe, land on any radio station on Earth. No algorithm, no recommendations — just you and a planet of sound.
description.zh-CN: 转动 3D 地球仪，落在地球上任何一个电台。没有算法，没有推荐引擎，只有你和一个充满声音的星球。
